adHeader: Cat Sitter--Boarding & Visits to your Home
adDetails: Hello! Looking for a pet sitter to watch your furry feline friend? I am available for Daily Vacation Visits & also have spots available for boarding of your cat(s) in my home. I offer cage/kennel free boarding. I live in a very clean home & I only watch a small amount of animals in my home at once. ( 3 pet limit at one time, that way every pet gets plenty of love and attention :) If you would like to set up a time to meet or chat about your upcoming travel plans please email me. Rates: $18-$22/day in my home-boarding(additional cat is $5 each) $16-$18/visit in your home (additional cat is $3 each) * I offer multiple pet discounts * holiday rates are an additional $10/day on all major holidays Keyword: cat, cat sitting , cat sitter, cat boarding, pet sitter, pet sitting
